ygData.subject: Re: Spell Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Your evocation will almost always be at the max possible level, unless you never hunt. You ll notice that right after you gain a new level, your evocation and
ygData.messageBody:
Your evocation will almost always be at the max possible level, unless you
never hunt. You'll notice that right after you gain a new level, your
evocation and channeling will quickly go up by 5 and then will stop. This is
because the max your skills can reach is based on your level:

(level * 5) + 5

So, at level 3 for instance, your evocation will max out at 20 (3 times 5 is
15, plus 5 is 20) and will not rise again until you level again.

-----Original Message-----
From: Bemeraroi@... [mailto:Bemeraroi@...]
Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 6:11 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Spell Questions


From: Bemeraroi@...

anyone know of a easy way to build of evoke other than hunting, like i
usually built up my abjuration by casting shield alot. and i curently use a

dagger should i train in staffs 1 or 2 handed since i found a worn great
staff on a skeleton?

Samurai
